p:
In combination of both plants formulated extracts and fractions, MCE recorded better protection (90%) at the lowest dose of 2 mg/cm2 followed by HF and EAF with 79% and 56% repellency, respectively (Fig. 3). Total protection was observed at 4, 6, and 8 mg/cm2 by MCE, HF, and EAF, respectively. Fig. 3.
Dose–response experiments of creams formulated with O. gratissimum + L. camara crude extracts and fractions against female Ae. aegypti bites.
